Hmmm... but I will admit after looking back for a good 5 minutes, I'm guessing the NTR could be argued to be when Haruta, the MC, feels like he was telling himself he was being unfaithful in his relationship and wanted to say I love you to Rio, while not knowing she was already with some other person? Ehh that's all I could understand if it could be considered even a little bit NTR. But if you were to ask me, I wouldnt consider this an NTR, or if this were NTR, not a good one. But that's fine with me, I don't really enjoy NTR unless the MC finds a way to escape or get revenge (In a non gory way).

I enjoyed the story. But uh this isn't NTR at all, or even a little bit in my opinion. I wasn't searching up NTR content but I see people complaining about it not being necessarily an NTR and looked at the tags. It's just a shy kid named Haruta who didn't have the courage to shoot his shot and the girl ended falling for the other dude, and the other dude GAVE the option that him and the girl should stop having sex so he could return to Haruta. The girl says no. Her choice. The MC a pusssyyyyy. Anyways, it's nice simple story concept which I actually enjoyed. Once again, not NTR.

@Demon Usamaro Well, this is the definition from JapanesewithAnimeDOTcom. More specifically this is Netorareru. At least this website counts those ntr without relations as Netorare. There are many "family" ntrs wher the mother or sister get cucked but main lead is not in a incestuous relationship. This case there are a few key points that make it into the "Neto" category. The relationship between chad and female is not public and so far only sexual whereas MC and FMC's close relationship is public. Chad repeatedly confirms with female about her relationship with MC, as if to indicate that he is taking FMC away from MC. Lastly, FMC has sex in a "non vanilla" way in the sense that there is on pleasure that is being expressed rather than gentleness and love.

Euphorism, your definition contradicts itself, and is vey inaccurate, ntr/cuckholding is about actual relationships and cheating with another man and being infront of the BF, or the BF knowing and can't do anything about it. These new "fake ntr/cuckhold" doujins are mostly just "humiliation", not ntr, it only has the "ntr" tag just to get some attention around it. There is nothing here that symbolizes ntr since she was with the other guy from the get go, meaning it was basically her BF. in conclusion no ntr.

Honestly this doesn't feel like NTR. Like she already loved Kaito and just genuinely saw Haruto as a younger sibling, so it's not like she was "stolen" or anything. First cum first served is what they say. If you're mad about this then I don't know what to say.

Although the term netorare can be quickly translated as "cuckolding," its definition is much more broad than that. That's because, in English, "cuckolding" only refers to a man's wife cheating on him with another guy. The cheated man labelled "cuckold."

In Japanese, netorare refers the act of someone "being taken (...to someone else's bed)." The genre can include a man's wife cheating on him, a woman's husband cheating on her. It can be their girlfriend, boyfriend. They don't even need to be actually dating: it could be somebody's childhood friend whom they never mustered the courage to ask out.

In fact, since the gist of it is just: character A has some feelings for character B, then character C comes and takes them away, it could be A's hot teacher that was taken away by someone. It could be their mother, father, daughter, son, sister, brother, etc. It's just a matter of framing the idea of them "being taken" by someone else.  - Japanese with Anime DOT com
